description: The default frame time of each slide is scheduled for 5 seconds. But it can be increased by 7 seconds per slide. So for standard, premium and pro accounts, the maximum length of video is 7*20 seconds, 7*30 seconds and 7*60 seconds, respectively.
description_text: The default frame time of each slide is scheduled for 5 seconds. But it can be increased by 7 seconds per slide. So for standard, premium and pro accounts, the maximum length of video is 7*20 seconds, 7*30 seconds and 7*60 seconds, respectively.
title: What is the maximum length of video that I can make with Picovico?
